articles.title: Seven charged for alleged roles in athlete thefts - ESPN
articles.description: Seven men have been charged by federal prosecutors for their alleged roles in a string of burglaries by a South American theft group at the homes of prominent professional athletes.
articles.content:
Feb 19, 2025, 07:28 AM ET
Seven men have been charged by federal prosecutors for their alleged roles in a string of burglaries at the homes of prominent professional athletes.
